text: Raiden is a fictional thunder god and playable character in the Mortal Kombat franchise. ==Portrayals== Since 2008, Richard Epcar has voiced him in games starting with Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe. He has been played by Christopher Lambert and James Remar in the movie series. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1992 Category:Fictional characters with electric or magnetic abilities Category:Mortal Kombat characters
title: Raiden (Mortal Kombat)
